author: Aila Slisco
title: Trump Administration Officials Indicate U.S. Economy Could Start Reopening in Early May
description: COVID-19 social distancing guidelines are set to expire on April 30 and several Trump administration officials have expressed optimism that the economy can be reopened shortly after, although medical experts do not appear confident that the virus will be cont…
content:
Several of President Donald Trump's top officials have indicated that the administration could be hoping to restart the economy by early May.
As the COVID-19 pandemic has continued to inflict severe damage to the economy, members of the administration have i… [+2779 chars]
